brand.name: OneLink Egypt
brand.tag: All government services in one link
hero.title.3: in one place — no need to open twenty sites.
hero.desc: OneLink Egypt gathers all major Egyptian government services in one simple and fast page — ID card, traffic, taxes, real estate, education, health — all in one organized portal.
hero.note: We do not represent any government entity; our role is to organize official links to make access easier.
search.placeholder: Search by service name: ID, traffic, taxes, real estate, education ...
search.hint: Example: type 'traffic' or 'tax' or 'education' to view related services.
svc.section.title: Top government services in Egypt
svc.section.sub: More services will be added based on user requests.
svc.traffic.name: Traffic Services
svc.tax.name: Taxes
svc.si.name: Social Insurance
svc.health.name: Health Services
svc.edu.name: Education & Universities
svc.housing.name: Real Estate Registration
price.title: 50 EGP / month — organize your public life easily
price.desc: Subscription gives you organized access to the most important government services in one place, with continuous updates and new services added based on user requests — without ads or confusion.
price.note: OneLink Egypt · v1.0.0 · Safar Al-Ghamdi · Demo Build
